alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sheridan County through 730 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Menlo, or 8 miles west of Hoxie, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Sheridan County, including the following locations... Seguin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Kansas.
